outcome.victory: Win - the enemy is no longer able or willing to fight, usually because their HP has been reduced to 0.
outcome.defeat: Lose - you are unable to continue the fight, as your HP has been reduced to 0.
outcome.knot_anal: Knot (Anal) - you and the enemy are tied together somehow, rendering you unable to fight.
outcome.knot_oral: Knot (Oral) - you and the enemy are tied together somehow, rendering you unable to fight.
outcome.surrender: Surrender - you've surrendered to the enemy.
outcome.rescue: Rescue - you've surrendered and let someone else handle the situation.
outcome.satisfied_anal: Satisfied - the enemy is satisfied, and will no longer fight.
outcome.satisfied_oral: Satisfied (Oral) - the enemy is satisfied (orally) and will no longer fight.
outcome.submission: Dominated - the enemy is no longer willing to fight because they've become submissive.
outcome.death: Death - you have been killed, and can no longer fight because you are dead.
outcome.pacifist: Pacifist - you have avoided conflict, as your opponent no longer wishes to fight, but to resolve things peacefully.
outcome.drunk: Drunk - you are drunk, and in no state to be fighting.
outcome.drunk_other: Drunk Enemy - Your enemy is drunk, and in no state to be fighting.
outcome.groin_kick: Scrambled Eggs - Your eggs have been scrambled. Oof.

hiro.label: Hiro

hiro_2.label: Hiro (2)

kylira.label: Kylira
kylira.description: An inexperienced, demure elf, who travels with their turtle companion and sells mushrooms. Is fascinated by human coc-- culture.

mimic.label: Mimic
mimic.description: A mysterious woman (?) that pretends to be a chest containing something valuable. In reality, the real treasure was the slimy tentacle dicking waiting inside\!

gadgeteer.label: Gadgeteer
gadgeteer.description: A strange merchant who specializes in the sale of various eccentric "gadgets". Has some interesting hobbies.
gadgeteer.fetishes: They prefer dominating and using toys.

brothel_madam.label: Brothel Madam
brothel_madam.description: The owner and purveyor of the brothel in Silajam, an institution with a surprising influence. She has a no-nonsense attitude and a very short temper, but she genuinely seems to care about those under her wing, and is a shrewd, if sometimes calculating, figure. Also, she has ass for days.

mouth_fiend.label: Mouth Fiend

vampire_hunter.description: A powerful demon slayer who also tends to the spirits of Silajam in its church. Can't find a codpiece that will fit her big dong.

shopkeep.label: Shopkeep
shopkeep.description: A sweet girl who works in the general store in Silajam. May have a secret.

innkeep.label: Innkeep
innkeep.description: An innkeep in Silajam. Accepts alternate forms of payment from cuties. If you hear a thud under their desk, someone is probably getting a "free" night at the inn.

dryad.label: Dryad
dryad.description: A woman of the wood. Literally. Charms forest-goers with her wiles - but can be charmed in turn.\n\nIs willing to share her fruit with those who give themselves freely.

cultist.label: Cultist
cultist.description: A cultist worshipping some dark goddess. Probably bisexual.

womp_guy.label: Womp Guy

pink_haired_prostitute.label: Pink-haired Prostitute
pink_haired_prostitute.description: A pushy prostitute who works in the brothel.

nurse.label: Cheery Nurse
nurse.description: A nurse working in a provincial sperm bank, which acts as a repository for semen, as well as a dispensary for milkshakes of her own making. She has an outwardly cheery demeanor, and is eager to sell her wares to adventurers. Her dual role as a sperm bank nurse and proprietress is, of course, a coincidence.\n\nNo refunds.

gloryhole.label: Gloryhole
gloryhole.description: Every hole is a chance for glory.

evoker.label: Evoker
evoker.description: A curious sorceror of some kind who cavorts with demons.

harpy.label: Harpy
harpy.description: The harpies are somewhat dimwitted beastmen, although there are rumors that they're more intelligent than their simple grasp of Common would let on. They're aerial predators, devouring smaller gamefowl and land-bound critters.\n\nIf you've ever accidentally tripped and sat on a feather duster - congratulations, you know what this harpy's bedroom habits are like.
harpy.anatomy: Their phalluses are surprisingly mammalian, even human-like, though exceptionally long and sheathed in a formidable foreskin. They aren't particularly hygenic by humanoid standards, so oral sex is best left to the brave and foolish. Their pubic hairs are actually feathers, so mating resembles an accident with a feather duster.
harpy.fetishes: They enjoy irrumatio, though it is not common practice among harpies.

elite_harpy.label: Elite Harpy
elite_harpy.description: The harpies are somewhat dimwitted beastmen, although there are rumors that they're more intelligent than their simple grasp of Common would let on. They're aerial predators, devouring smaller gamefowl and land-bound critters.\n\nHarpies with more honed instincts tend to lead flocks, and are as voracious hunters as they are voracious mates.

slime.label: Slime
slime.description: Slimes are, well, made out of sentient slime. The core visible within them must remain intact for them to maintain their sentience, however.\n\nTea is a peaceful creature who tends to take the form of a busty, full-figured woman. Avoid her if you have a mean streak, unless you want to meet a most ignominious end.

brigand.label: Brigand
brigand.description: Humans are widespread surface dwellers with strange ideas about what goes into where. They're little liked by most of other sapient races, and a few of the non-sapient ones, too. On the bright side, they do make excellent cheese.\n\nBrigands wander the roads in pursuit of the simple pleasures in life - booty, mostly.

centaur.label: Centaur
centaur.description: The centaurs are famed for their archery skills, their dominance for the plains - for some clans, their brutality, and for others, their temperance. Centaur society has very strict codes of conduct, and centaur cocks are the size of... well, the phrase is "hung like a horse", innit?\n\nHer archery skills are impressive, and they're not the only thing. Hobbies\: making mares wink, making twinks mares.
centaur.anatomy: Their phalluses are equine in nature and proud in stature. It is not recommended that humans mate with centaurs for this reason, as there are tangible dangers and it can't be good for morale. Picture a mare's winking hole to get a full picture of why this is a bad idea.
centaur.fetishes: They don't have a strong preference.

unicorn.label: Unicorn
unicorn.description: The centaurs are famed for their archery skills, their dominance for the plains - for some clans, their brutality, and for others, their temperance. Centaur society has very strict codes of conduct, and centaur cocks are the size of... well, the phrase is "hung like a horse", innit?\n\nA rare breed of centaur is that of the unicorn, who is particularly attracted to virgins.  Virgins should be cautioned, however, that despite this attraction, their behaviors indicate they have little interest in preserving said virginity.
unicorn.fetishes: They are attracted exclusively to virgins.

goblin.label: Goblin
goblin.description: Goblins are gobliny little buggers, aren't they?  Mischevious, energetic and often cruel, goblins have voracious appetites for food and... fun.  Try to keep them in your field of vision.\n\nFemale goblins are capable of a sort of pseudo-impregnation, and are thus better left to their own devices.
goblin.anatomy: The goblinoid reproduction cycle defies study, and can best be described as "banana-pants." Avoid.
goblin.fetishes: They like switching between using someone's ass and their mouth.

goblin_male.label: Goblin
goblin_male.description: Goblins are gobliny little buggers, aren't they?  Mischevious, energetic and often cruel, goblins have voracious appetites for food and... fun.  Try to keep them in your field of vision.\n\nMale goblins often fear female goblins, and will let them get first pick of playthings.

orc.label: Orc
orc.description: Orcs are notoriously strong for goblinoids or humanoids, however you choose to classify them. The orcs of the region respect bravery and shun cowardice.\n\nCounter-intuitively, Urka prefers meek suitors to strong ones, although she won't kick a brave, strong, but soft boy out of bed for eating crackers.
orc.anatomy: Their phallus is very large by human standards, and covered in small protrusions near the head that are designed to force an orc to ovulate, or for a human to reconsider their life decisions. Full, heavy testicles are not ornamental; ejaculation guaranteed to impregnate unless injected anally.

adventurer.label: Adventurer
adventurer.description: A young spellsword who, despite his diminuitive size, wields a large battle axe. Known for his haughty sense of superiority... and his peculiar bedroom habits.
adventurer.fetishes: They enjoy both giving and receiving.

ogre.label: Ogre
ogre.description: Ogres are massive, brutishly strong goblinoids - although some argue they're more closely related to humans. Ogrish kingdoms used to be common, but now it's more common to see singular ogres sleeping in caves and clearings, living simple lives of sleep and slaughter.\n\nSome ogres have a sexual predilection towards smaller humanoids - these humanoids should best avoid ogres entirely unless they want to find out what an ogre-sized plunger does to a smallfolk sized-asshole.
ogre.anatomy: See\: average length and girth. Adventurers are warned to stay clear of any ogres in heat unless they want a two-foot long ogre dick up the butt, and ogres aren't picky.

beastmistress.label: Drow
beastmistress.description: The drow are a secretive culture, so little is known about them as a group, but the outliers that venture to the surface world are a diverse bunch of ruthless scoundrels.\n\nThe huntresses, or beastmistresses, are known to be particularly far-reaching, riding atop powerful, bear-like felines in search of... prey.

spider.label: Spider
spider.description: Little is known about the spider woman of the ruins, other than that she is singularly dangerous and malevolent. Her thousands of young are an army their own - enter the ruins at your own peril.
spider.fetishes: They prefer oviposition and feminine boys.

golem.label: Golem
golem.description: Stone brought to life is a sure sign that a mage is extremely powerful, and also likely old and bored.\n\nIf they look like this one, add "lonely" to that list. Does a magic conduit really need ass for days?
golem.fetishes: They have no preferences, other than executing their assigned tasks.

ghost.label: Ghost
ghost.description: Spirits of the dead can sometimes linger.\n\nAn ancient royalty of some long-dead kingdom - brought low by sorrow that her marriage of convenience was a loveless one. Though her husband begrudgingly tried, he could not endure her love-making, and left her heart-broken, in much the same way that she left his ass broken.
ghost.anatomy: Their genitals are selectively intangible, and can interact with the living world. Sizable for a human in life, and nothing has changed there post-mortem. Can be tangible even when invisible, so sleeping with mouth closed is recommended.
ghost.fetishes: Because of their inexperience, they only think of sex in terms of giving (love), but their actual preference isn't as strong.

bunny.label: Puca
bunny.description: The puca are famed for their wiles and the good, and bad, fortune that they bring.\n\nAs far as debt collectors go, she seems pleasant enough - but woe befall those who are consistently late with their coin.

angel.label: Angel
angel.description: A divine creature serving an ancient, long forgotten goddess.  It's not certain what domains her goddess has or had as her charge, but it is known exactly how long her trumpet is.

naga.label: Naga
naga.description: The naga is a particularly vicious creature. It will just as soon crush an opponent as it will devour them or defile them - depending on its mood.\n\nEven the simple naga is an incredibly dangerous foe - powerful, cunning, silent, tenacious. Underestimate their sadism at your own peril.
naga.anatomy: Their phalluses are multiple. Do not engage.

quetzal.label: Quetzal Goddess
quetzal.description: The naga is a particularly vicious creature. It will just as soon crush an opponent as it will devour them or defile them - depending on its mood.\n\nOne of the ancient gods, supposedly, is an antedeluvian Naga, of an extinct "Quetzal" variety. She is feared far and wide, despite rarely if ever descending from the summit of mount Xiuh. There are rumors that she requires virgin sacrifices - always male, with a preference for a soft face.  It is unknown what becomes of them.

mermaid.label: Mermaid
mermaid.description: The mermaid - beautiful and mysterious, an aquatic creature with the body of human and the fin of a fish. They are known for luring sailors with their alluring looks and songs, but it is not known what becomes of the sailors thereafter.\n\nThe females are known to lay eggs - but where they lay their eggs is not known.
mermaid.fetishes: They prefer men of breeding age.

warlock.label: Warlock
warlock.description: A warlock of considerable power - little else about her is known, other than she has a habit of toying with men.
warlock.fetishes: They vastly prefer feminine boys and using magic during sex.

giantess.label: Giantess
giantess.anatomy: A sect of the religion that worships Her specifically worships it, and with good reason.

dullahan.label: Dullahan
dullahan.description: A headless rider... feared for their inhuman strength, and their terrible appearance.  Rumor has it that when their head is seperated from their body, their lustful body acts on its darkest impulses... and has no preference for men or women. For those caught by this headless apparition, they will quickly learn that she has another, more fearsome head. Particularly when they become dreadfully acquainted, and uncomfortably opened up, with it.
dullahan.fetishes: They enjoy tender sex. Their body, absent their head, prefers rough sex.

alraune.label: Alraune

alraune.fetishes: They prefer to spread their seed, but don't mind receiving extra nutrients.

wasp.label: Wasp
wasp.description: The wasp-people are known their individualistic, predatory behaviors and for their reproductive cycles, which closely resembles their smaller, less intelligent cousins. Avoiding their stings is strongly advised, even if you've always been curious how chitin feels.
wasp.anatomy: Their phalluses are chitinous, and their ovipositors lay eggs. Stay clear.

doppelganger.label: Doppelganger
doppelganger.description: A creature which mimics its prey. Nothing else is known.

persephone.label: Persephone
persephone.description: A stern, sadistic vampiress who is often at the whims of her sire, Helena.

helena.label: Helena
helena.description: A playful, manic vampiress who heaps affection and lust upon her ward, Persephone.
helena.fetishes: A lady never reveals her secrets.

minotauress.label: Minotauress
minotauress.description: An incredibly strong, deceptively polite, cocky, bestial guardian. Can make any curvy path straight, labyrinth or otherwise.
minotauress.fetishes: They prefer smaller partners and dominating and hide and seek.

fire_elemental.label: Fire Elemental
fire_elemental.description: A spirit of fire, concerned with nothing but spreading its flame. Coalescing power over the eons, they possess a human-like intelligence, but little concern for human frailty. Incredibly dangerous.
fire_elemental.anatomy: Their phallus is fairly standard for a human, if hotter than human body temperature, but their testicles, and to a lesser extent their penis, become superheated as they fill with semen and apporaching ejaculation, and the resulting superheated semen can be a nasty surprise for an unprepared lover.

ettin.label: Ettin
ettin.description: Ogres are massive, brutishly strong goblinoids - although some argue they're more closely related to humans. Ogrish kingdoms used to be common, but now it's more common to see singular ogres sleeping in caves and clearings, living simple lives of sleep and slaughter.\n\nTwo headed-ogres, or Ettin, are known to bicker among themselves, literally. This is the saving grace of many an adventurer, as they may not be able to decide what horrible fate should become them.
ettin.fetishes: They have a preference for smaller partners. One head has a preference for oral, the other has a preference for anal. Not clear which one always tells lies.

kitsune.label: Kitsune
kitsune.description: Fox-like beastmen known for their flashy style and bubbly personalities, one could be forgiven for underestimating their cunning and their ruthlessness. It is rumored that they have dual-natures, and can be coldly calculating and sadistic towards their enemies. But, really, how scary can a busty, wide-hipped fashion-conscious woman be?

A dangerous combination, particularly due to their nature.

jester.label: Jester
jester.description: A mysterious jester. What is her deal?

dark_knight.label: Dark Knight
dark_knight.description: The dark knight, feared servant of the Demon King. Beware.

catgirl.label: Catgirl
catgirl.anatomy: Her phallus is feline, with small spines meant to ensure that the female begins ovulating. This takes some adjusting to, but it poses minimal risk of causing anything but superficial injury and big, embarrasssing moans like a cat in heat.
catgirl.fetishes: They prefer all kinds of play.

tentacle_witch.label: Tentacle Witch
tentacle_witch.description: A master of a very particular dark art\: that of tentaclemancy, or divination using tentacles. Turns out, that when you consult tentacles to divine the future, the future is always "tentacles". Dislikes mondays, and likes to play with boys in inscrutable ways.

demon_king.label: Demon King
demon_king.description: The "Demon King". Having immense power, both destructive and seductive, they're in a class all their own. Heroes beware. Appears to have the blood of both Succubi and Dragons.

elf_lady.description: A mysterious elf woman found only by healing ponds, of which she is protective.

wereslut.description: It's not certain if the werewolves are wolves who have become men, men who have become wolves, or simply a beastman-like creature that could appear to be either, but their beast-like strength and agility and sharp claws makes them extremely dangerous.\n\nAppearing like a village librarian, this werewolf has a penchant for mating with human boys, particularly strong ones... with disastrous, gaping results.
wereslut.anatomy: Their phalluses are like a canine's, with a bulbous, inflatable knot near the base that ensures total insemination and a complete loss of dignity for the unfortunate recipient of her mating. The resulting stretching is likely, in part, permanent, so the curious best beware.
wereslut.fetishes: They prefer giving to receiving, strong males, and they enjoy doggy-style and doggy-style partners.

wereslut_quickshot.description: It's not certain if the werewolves are wolves who have become men, men who have become wolves, or simply a beastman-like creature that could appear to be either, but their beast-like strength and agility and sharp claws makes them extremely dangerous.\n\nYoung and inexperienced, but frightfully strong, this werewolf has one and only one goal\: mating. And she's not too picky about her partner.

lupa_werewolf.description: It's not certain if the werewolves are wolves who have become men, men who have become wolves, or simply a beastman-like creature that could appear to be either, but their beast-like strength and agility and sharp claws makes them extremely dangerous.\n\nHowever, some werewolves are rather docile and playful. Their sexual apetites may sometimes lead to unfortunate circumstances, but they mean no harm.

cargirl.description: A catgirl with a very flirtatious and playful personality. Rumor has it that her bite is worse than her meow, but that she mostly just enjoys indulging herself.

lemon_king.description: The "Lemon King". Having immense power, both destructive and seductive, they're in a class all their own (citrus). Heroes beware. Appears to have the blood of both Succubi and Dragons and also Lemons (?).

null.fetishes: They prefer nothing, for they are nothing.

strength.description: Strength determines raw attack power, which affects damage, how much attacks unbalance an enemies, and contests of strength, such as wrestling, struggling, or weapon locks. CAUTION\: high strength attracts werewolves\!

endurance.description: Endurance determines stamina and resilience, which affects your ability to keep up an assault without getting tired, your ability to shrug off low damage attacks, and wear heavier armor without becoming exhausted.

agility.description: Agility determines balance and skill, affecting your ability to keep a sure footing even while doing acrobatic maneuvers, getting unblockable attacks against enemies, and evading enemy attacks.

perception.description: Perception determines your ability to see what attacks an enemy may use next and prepare accordingly, as well as your base scouting ability, which determines what information you can see about upcoming areas.

magic.description: Magic determines your magical capabilities, such as how powerful magic spells are, and how many of them you can cast before becoming magically exhausted.

charisma.description: Charisma determines your ability to influence an enemy, getting them to calm down and listen to reason, enraging them, or seducing them.

battle_screen.health_bar_tooltip: This represents your health. Higher health improves your statistics, specifically Strength, Agility, and Endurance, whereas low health reduces them. Damage from attacks and certain status effects reduces health.
battle_screen.stamina_bar_tooltip: This represents your stamina. Higher stamina improves your statistics, specifically Strength and Agility, whereas low stamina reduces them. Using skills costs stamina, and certain enemy attacks and status effects reduces stamina as well. Recover stamina by using restful skills.
battle_screen.balance_widget_tooltip: This represents your balance. As your balance lowers, you become more prone to falling. Using unstable skills reduces balance, as does receiving powerful blows. Recover balance by using stable skills.
battle_screen.mana_bar_tooltip: This represents your available mana for casting spells. Spells will fizzle if there is not enough mana available.
battle_screen.arousal_bar_tooltip: This bar represents arousal. As it fills, arousal level increases through several stages; once it fills entirely it results in a climax, which will cause orgasm and ejaculation in characters that are able to.

battlescreen.this_will_cause_you_to_collapse: THIS WILL CAUSE YOU TO COLLAPSE\!
battlescreen.this_will_cause_you_to_lose_your_footing: THIS WILL CAUSE YOU TO LOSE YOUR FOOTING\!
battlescreen.stance_widget_tooltip: This is your current stance. Most skills will change your stance, and certain skills used by your opponent will as well. Your stance determines what skills are available to you at any given time, as does your opponent's stance, and vice versa.\n\n

skill_text.tooltip: This is a display of your opponent's next action. The higher your perception, the more often this is visible, and the more information is displayed, including their next stance and their next skill.

outcomes.tooltip: These are the possible outcomes for this battle. Depending on the condition of the combatants, you may receive any one of these.

battlescreen.lust_widget_tooltip: Current Lust\: {0}%\n\nThis represents lust. Sexual activities performed by you and your opponent raise lust, and climaxing and distracting yourself can lower it. Higher lust causes arousal to raise faster and reduces your self-control.
battlescreen.mana_widget_tooltip: Current Mana Reserve\: {0}\n\nThis represents your mana reserve. Certain skills will allow you to draw mana out of this reserve and into your active mana pool. Otherwise, this will be used to refill your active mana pool when you have a chance to rest.
battlescreen.missile_display_tooltip: This represents your ammo supply for use with a bow. When you have no ammo remaining, you can no longer use your bow attacks.

weapon_display_tooltip.start: Weapons are used for most attacks, and are required for some, and are also used for parrying. As grip on a weapon loosens, it becomes less effective, and will eventually be disarmed.

armor_tooltip.shield: Blockable attacks will be partially or fully blocked by a shield if the opponent uses an opposing skill with a blocking component. This will damage the shield; as a shield is damaged it will lower in effectiveness and eventually break.
armor_tooltip.armwear: Only specific wrist-targeting attacks strike here, but blows to the wrist will loosen the grip on the weapon, eventually leading to a disarming.
armor_tooltip.underwear: Low height attacks strike here. Certain skills can be used to remove underwear.
armor_tooltip.covers_top: Medium and high height attacks strike this, making it paramount to keep protection here as strong as possible.
armor_tooltip.footwear: Only specific foot-targeting attacks strike here, but blows to the foot will destabilize and eventually causing tripping.
armor_tooltip.headgear: Only specific head-targeting attacks strike here, but blows to the head will cause disorientation, and the greater damage received by the head, the greater the disorientation.

battlescreen.grapple_display_tooltip:
This indicates your current grapple status ({0}). 

Statuses more on the right represent when you are in control of your opponent, and statuses more on the left represent when they are in control of you.

Winning grapple rounds will typically move the grapple indicator to the right, while losing typically moves the grapple indicator to the left. 

Available techniques are dependent on both your grapple stance and the level of the grapple indicator.

highlander.description: Dark-skinned people from the highlands to the south. No outstanding qualities, but known for their crafts and affinity for the sea.

mountainman.description: People native to the mountains, where life is hard. Hardy, but isolated and mundane. (Reduced stat loss from low health/stamina, -1 PER/MAG/CHA)
mountainman.label: Mountainman

elfblood.description: People from the east, known for their elven ancestry and features. Slow metabolism accompanies slow growth. (-1 Food Consumption, Slower Level Gain)
elfblood.label: Elfblood

orcblood.description: People from the north, known for their orcish ancestry and features. Fast metabolism, and enhanced physical attributes. (+1 Food Consumption, +1 STR/END/AGI)
orcblood.label: Orcblood

tutorial.stances: When you use a skill you will end up in that skill's resulting stance, visible as an icon next to the skill's name.  When in a new stance, you will have access to new skills.  You can use a skill that will return you to the original stance, or even another, previously unavailable stance.
tutorial.health_and_stamina_degradation: When your health or stamina is reduced, you will accrue penalties to your statistics.  To see these penalties, highlight your character portrait.  The icons next to your health and stamina bars will also indicate that this has occurred.  Recover health or stamina to remove these penalties.
tutorial.grapples: When you enter a grapple with an opponent, your available skills are limited by stamina and your current grapple status, indicated above.  Struggling or grappling with the enemy can improve your grapple status - but they will use skills that will have the opposite effect\!
tutorial.knockdown: When you run out of stamina or stability, you will fall to the ground\!  While attempting to get to your feet, you can transition through multiple stances, including Hands-and-Knees and Kneeling stance, and your available skills are limited by your current stamina and stability.
tutorial.disarm: When you run out of weapon grip, your weapon will be disarmed\! The disarmed weapon is now in your item list, and can be re-equipped by "using" it.
tutorial.armor_defense: Sometimes, a piece of armor will have more damage reduction than your attack's damage. You'll need to keep hitting that piece of armor until it is weakened or destroyed in order to harm the enemy on that location, or use stronger attacks.
